name: load-airplane
desc: Load package into airplane. Input: package, airplane, location

name: load-truck
desc: Load package into truck. Input: package, truck, location

name: move-airplane
desc: Fly airplane from one point to another. Inputs: source,destination, plane

name: move-truck
desc: Drive truck from one point to another. Inputs: source, destination, truck

name: unload-airplane
desc: Unload package from airplane. Input: package, airplane, location

name: unload-truck
desc: Unload package from truck. Input: package, truck, location
